meanings.definition: The thymus gland or pancreas of an animal, typically calf or lamb, used as food.
meanings.sent1: I tried cooking sweetbreads for the first time last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious sweetbreads as an appetizer.
meanings.sent3: When the chef accidentally dropped the sweetbreads, they bounced like rubber balls.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sizzling sweetbreads filled the kitchen, making everyone's mouth water.
meanings.sent5: Grandma's secret recipe for crispy sweetbreads was the highlight of the family dinner.

meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a mouthwatering sweetbreads dish for the food festival.
meanings.sent2: I ordered the special of the day, which happened to be sweetbreads.
meanings.sent3: The sweetbreads dish was so popular that it sold out within minutes.
meanings.sent4: The presentation of the sweetbreads dish was like a work of art on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The sweetbreads dish had a unique blend of flavors that left everyone wanting more.
